title: Football Is Back & Biden "Beats Pharma" | Daily Best of September 6 | Rick & Bubba
description:
We recap all the action as college football makes it's return. Joe Biden claims to have "beat Pharma this year." We hope the president isn't just talking about forgetting to take his medication. A Tulsa news reporter is doing fine after having a stroke while live on the air. A carnival ride in India malfunctions while people are on board. We look back at the efficacy of Ivermectin over the course of the pandemic. And lastly, Speedy went dove hunting and Greg delivered some plywood to Adler's house, then a boxing match breaks out.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
